code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[submitted,setSubmitted]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('http://api_safal.learn.cloudlaya.com/api/submit',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({name})});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('sorry Failed to submit data');}setSubmitted(true);setName('');}catch(error){console.error('Error submitting the data:j',error);}};const handleInputChange=e=>{setName(e.target.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Hello World"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter your name",value:name,onChange:handleInputChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]}),submitted&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Data submitted successfully!"})]})});}export default App;
